channel.title: [508] Help?

item.title: [508] Help?
item.dc:creator: @kpop kpop
item.description:
@kpop wrote:

Is it possible to make it so players with admin/mod are shown different items in their quest list than non admin/mods?

maybe if i make it likeee…

if (p.Rights >= 1) { setString(p, "Pro", 274, 13); } else if (p.Rights < 1) { setString(p, "!~_-_~_-_~!", 274, 13); }

i tried that one and it cannot find the p.rights symbol,
do i need to add a boolean or void?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 09, 2009, 08:27:53 pm[/size][hr]or maybe i’d have to create an entirely new system for this to work?

like this…

[code]public boolean ModMenu()
{
if(p.rights >=1)

{
return true;
}
else
{
return false;
}
}[/code]
Then create somethin likeee…

if ModMenu()) { setString(p, "Mute", 274, 13); } else { setString(p, "Apply for Staff", 274, 13); }[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 09, 2009, 09:35:51 pm[/size][hr]nobody knows anything?? god why do i even come here for help anymore i just end up answering other people’s questions… It seems like the only questions that are asked here can be answered by a tut or google.com… if anyone has enough knowledge to truly help me it’ll be much appreciated.
